paper_abstract: In this paper, we apply the representation theorem established in Mardones-Perez and de Prada Vicente (2012) [12] to define and study the degree in which some topological-type properties of fuzzy pseudometric spaces are fulfilled. Fuzzifying structures which appear naturally are also investigated, and the relation between these structures and fuzzy pseudometric spaces is explored. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Fuzzy pseudometric spaces vs fuzzifying structures
